attributes.action: remove the funding from the Muslim community in Luton
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In recent times £600,000 has either been spent or is planned to be spent "de-radicalising" the Muslim community in Luton.

Based on the protests observed during the parade of the  2nd Battalion Royal Anglian Regiment this clearly has not worked. 

The remainder of this money should be withdrawn and no more spent in future on this wasted effort.
